rows.label: tlk401010_msg0001
rows.name:
Perhaps there are untoward
intentions on the Superbia side.
Frankly, I would expect it.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0002
rows.name:
But I can assure you that we
of Invidia have no intentions of
trying anything funny.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0003
rows.name: The word of Queen Lagert is absolute.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0004
rows.name:
We trust in our Queen, and as she wills
it, we gladly put our weapons aside.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0005
rows.name: So there is no need for concern.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0006
rows.name:
...Of course, if the Queen ordered me to
take up arms, I would gladly fight tooth
and nail against those Superbian dogs.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0007
rows.name: You would do well not to forget that.
